price: Sai Muka aika a kansu da cikõwa, da fãra, da ƙwarƙwata da kwãɗi, da jini; ãyõyi abũbuwan rarrabẽwa*; Sai suka kangare, kuma suka kasance mutãne mãsu laifi.
arabic: فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلطُّوفَانَ وَٱلۡجَرَادَ وَٱلۡقُمَّلَ وَٱلضَّفَادِعَ وَٱلدَّمَ ءَايَٰتٖ مُّفَصَّلَٰتٖ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ وَكَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا مُّجۡرِمِينَ
footnotes: * Ãyõyin da suka je musu a cikin lõkatai daban-daban dõmin a ja hankalinsu, kõ zã su yi ĩmãni. Kõwace ãyã tanã kwãna bakwai sunã wahala da ita, sa'an nan su rõƙi Mũsã ya yi addu'a a kuranye ta, sa'an nan a bãyan wani lõkaci sai su kõma wa kãfircinsu, kamar yadda ãyõyi mãsu biyar wannan suka bayyana.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-arsalnā ʿalayhimu al-ṭūfāna wal-jarāda wal-qumala wal-ḍafādiʿa wal-dama āyātin mufaṣṣalātin fa-is'takbarū wakānū qawman muj'rimīna
